message.body: Hey sorry for not getting back to you. Is the turntable still available?
Hi. If you are still interested, you can pick it up tonight. I have someone else who is supposed to come look tmw but you can have it
I really do want it but im out right now. Ill definitely take it first thing in the morning or tonight if youre ok with that
Morning is fine. Let me know. Have a good night.
Ok. Ill try to be up early if you are. Probably best to just tell me when youre awake and free for me to come by. And thank you very much!
Sounds good! Text you in the am probably around 9:30
